basic.description: Fundamental mechanistic concepts of organic reactions, structure-activity relationships, solvent effects and catalysis. Mechanistic aspects of substitution, addition, elimination and pericyclic reactions. Fall Term.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Mechanistic Organic Chem

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ:  ENCH 245 or CHEM 245 and registered in BSCE
